io.github.amanshuraikwar.cryptonyte.ui.list

Class RecyclerViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ViewHolder>
      • io.github.amanshuraikwar.cryptonyte.ui.list.RecyclerViewAdapter

  • public class RecyclerViewAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ViewHolder>
    RecyclerView adapter which supports different type of ViewHolders efficiently. Uses visitable design pattern.
    Author:
    Amanshu Raikwar Created by sonu on 30/6/17.
